rules_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Create a Food token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“For supper, we'll be having three-meat stew, packed with all the protein a young warrior could need—and a pinch of salt, to taste.”[/i]
